segments.text: The water is just pouring out of the sink, and the woman doesn’t even notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on that wobbly stool, and it looks like he’s about to fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for a cookie, but she’s in danger too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is getting slippery, and someone could get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe the woman is so absorbed in drying that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is just a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone walks in and stops this before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are risking so much just for a few cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is one of the scariest things I’ve ever seen in a kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR
